page.title: 04Education 2
page.content:
{ Newby primary school}was built in 1950. It has 312 pupils and 12 teachers. There are 8 classrooms, a partial hearing unit, 2 playgrounds, a hall, a television room and 3 BBC computers.
{ Northstead school}was built in 1937. There are 457 pupils and l5 teachers. Facilities include a playing field, changing rooms, playground, dining room, hall, canteen and a BBC computer.
{ Scalby school}is the only comprehensive secondary school in this D-block. It has 1059 pupils and 55.5 teachers. Scalby was completed in September 1942. It has tennis courts, computer room, workshops and laboratories, a jazz band and orchestra.
